data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.3.1 - iPad Air 2, iOS 11.4 Public Beta
data.actual_result: It scrolls automatically up based on the length of the message.
data.expected_result: Chat position shouldn't change after closing the invite screen.
data.short_description: Closing invite/join screen automatically scrolls up in chat when embed is off-screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a very long message with a valid invite (make sure to test it with the latest message, older messages don't work) - Scroll up the chat so the invite embed goes a bit off-screen but is still visible - Click on the invite embed - Close the join/invite screen
